mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FACILITY_RESERVE (RESERVE_IDX, FACILITY_IDX, USERIDX, RESERVE_DATE, RESERVE_TIME, HEAD_COUNT) VALUES (SEQ_RESERVE_IDX.NEXTVAL, #{facilityIdx}, #{userIdx}, #{reserveDate}, #{reserveTime}, #{headCount})
